name: Farm Blast - Match Game
description:
The most addicting tap-and-match matching game ever!Click 2 or more blocks of the same color to eliminate them or combine various props! Simple, fun, and challenging! You'll solve the most captivating puzzles and have fun everywhere!

FEATURES
● Complete levels to collect stars and get rich rewards!
● Log in every day to claim daily rewards!
● Over 1000+ levels for you to explore!
● Play the game anytime, anywhere, even without internet!

HOW TO PLAY
● Click the adjacent squares of the same color to eliminate them all.
● 3 useful tools are there to help.
● Reach the target score or collect stars to enter the next level.
● The higher the number of eliminations each time, the higher the score.
● Break the record and watch combos.
